mapper.select: SELECT rt.report_no AS reportNo, m.member_id AS memberId, m.nickname AS nickname, rt.reported_date AS reportedDate, rt.status AS status, rt.reason AS reason, CASE WHEN gbr.report_no IS NOT NULL THEN 'group_buys' WHEN mr.report_no IS NOT NULL THEN 'members' ELSE 'error' END AS reportCase FROM REPORTS rt JOIN members m ON m.member_no = rt.reporter_no LEFT JOIN MEMBER_REPORTS mr ON rt.report_no = mr.report_no LEFT JOIN GROUP_BUY_REPORTS gbr ON rt.report_no = gbr.report_no
